author: Rebekah Valentine
description: It's official: Resident Evil 9 is coming, and we just got our first real look at it during Summer Game Fest 2025 as well as a release date.
title: Resident Evil 9 Officially Revealed at Summer Game Fest 2025

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: If you enjoyed the Dying Light: The Beast gameplay that was just shown off at the Summer Game Fest Showcase, good news: we've got a LOT more! That starts with a 30-minute exclusive extended gameplay video as the kickoff to our all-June-long coverage of Dying Light: The Beast through our IGN First "cover story" editorial program.
title: Dying Light: The Beast – Exclusive 30-Minute Extended Gameplay Trailer | IGN First

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: I haven’t played nearly enough of Deadpool VR to determine just how good it is yet, but it genuinely did surprise me with how fun this beloved character – who hasn’t been playable in a video game in over a decade – was to suit up as in VR.
title: Playing Deadpool VR: 5 Things I Didn’t Expect

author: Michael Cripe
description: While IO Interactive stays hard at work on 007 First Light, the team made an appearance at Summer Game Fest 2025 to reveal another James Bond tribute that will see Hitman players taking out Mads Mikkelsen’s character from Casino Royale.
title: Hitman World of Assassination Elusive Target Sees Mads Mikkelsen Reprise Iconic Casino Royale Role

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: This year's Summer Game Fest included the announcement of a brand new Wu-Tang Clan game from Brass Lion Entertainment: a cooperative action RPG called Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver.
title: Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver Announced at Summer Game Fest

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The lead singer and manager of Imagine Dragons, brothers Mac and Dan Reynolds, have long dreamed of making games. Now, they're making that dream come true with Last Flag.
title: Why Imagine Dragons Are Making a 'Pure' Capture the Flag Video Game

author: Tom Phillips
description: Lego Party! Announced and This Mario Party-Style Game is Exactly What It Sounds Like
title: Mario Party-Style Game Lego Party! Announced and It's Exactly What It Sounds Like

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Survival horror game ILL is showing signs of life...or death, as it were...in a new trailer at Summer Game Fest today.
title: Mysterious, Haunting Body Horror Game ILL Gets New Gameplay Trailer at Summer Game Fest

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Wildgate, the space shooter from former Blizzard-led studio Moonshot Games and publisher Dreamhaven, will launch on PC, Xbox, and PlayStation on July 22 of this year.
title: Wildgate, the Space Shooter From Former Blizzard Devs, Is Out Next Month

author: Michael Cripe
description: Techland showed up for Summer Game Fest 2025 to announce a Dying Light: The Beast release date of August 22, 2025, for PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X | S.
title: Dying Light: The Beast Release Date Set for August With Gameplay Trailer at Summer Game Fest 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: During Summer Game Fest today, Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree was announced from Bandai Namco. It's a new roguelike game made by developer Brownies that looks reminiscent of Hades, but derived instead from Eastern mysticism.
title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree Is a Hades-Like from Bandai Namco Announced at Summer Game Fest

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Following the 2021 re-release of Ubisoft's Scott Pilgrim vs. the World: The Game, the developers of TMNT: Shredder's Revenge are taking a crack at a brand new Scott Pilgrim game. It's called Scott Pilgrim EX, and it's coming to PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Switch in early 2026.
title: Scott Pilgrim EX Is a Brand New Adventure Hearkening Back to Classic Brawlers

author: Michael Cripe
description: For those excited for developer Neowiz’s highly anticipated Overture add-on content the wait is over: the Lies of P DLC is out right now.
title: Lies of P: Overture Shadow-Dropped for PC and Consoles With New Trailer at Summer Game Fest 2025

author: Tom Phillips
title: Lego Voyagers Is a New 2-Player Co-Op Adventure With a Split Fiction-Style Friends Pass

author: Dan Stapleton
title: Lies of P: Overture Review

author: Michael Cripe
description: Embark Studios reappeared at Summer Game Fest 2025 to announce an Arc Raiders release date for PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X | S.
title: Arc Raiders Secures October Release Date for PC and Consoles With Trailer at Summer Game Fest 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: During today's Summer Game Fest showcase, Square Enix took the spotlight to reveal a new social deduction game, Killer Inn.
title: Square Enix Reveals Killer Inn, a New, Team-Based Social Deduction Game, at Summer Game Fest

author: Tom Phillips
description: Game of Thrones: War for Westeros is a new real-time strategy game announced during Summer Game Fest.
title: Game of Thrones RTS War for Westeros Lets You Kill Jon Snow (Again) to Your Heart's Content

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: During today's Summer Game Fest event, we saw a new trailer for Onimusha: Way of the Sword, which showed off more of the game's slashy smashy combat.
title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword Gets New Summer Game Fest Trailer Showing More Slashy Combat

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Atomic Heart 2 is currently in development at Mundfish, as shared today in an announcement at Summer Game Fest. Additionally, Mundfish also revealed The CUBE, a new multiplayer RPG shooter set in the Atomic Heart universe.
title: Atomic Heart 2 Announced at Summer Game Fest

author: Michael Cripe
description: Summer Game Fest 2025 came with a surprise cameo from Venom and The Dark Knight Rises actor Tom Hardy, who is involved in an ambitious new project called Chronicles: Medieval.
title: Chronicles: Medieval Trailer Teases Ambitious Battles With Narration from Tom Hardy at Summer Game Fest 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: In a surprising vampiric twist, we're getting a sequel to 2019's Code Vein. It is aptly titled Code Vein 2, and it's due out 2026 across PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X and S.
title: Code Vein 2 Revealed at Summer Game Fest 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: In a brand new trailer shown today at Summer Game Fest, we got our first listen of renowned voice actor Troy Baker in his latest role: a crime-solving mouse, the star of MOUSE: P.I. For Hire.
title: Troy Baker's Latest Gaming Role Is as a Mystery-Solving Mouse

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach launches later this month, but for those who simply can't wait, Hideo Kojima took the stage at Summer Game Fest today to show a new clip from the game.
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach New Clip Shown at Summer Game Fest

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Geoff Keighley kicked off Summer Game Fest 2025 with the announcement of Mortal Shell 2.
title: Soulslike Sequel Mortal Shell 2 Announced at Summer Game Fest 2025

author: Leana Hafer
description: The best flight stick, racing wheel, fight stick, accessibility controller, and more for the PS5.
title: The Best PS5 Controllers Available in 2025

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Summer Game Fest 2025 has arrived and promises to reveal a bit of the exciting future of video games. While we don't know exactly what secrets this year's show will unveil, we'll be here to gather all the biggest announcements in one place to ensure you don't miss a thing. We'll also be updating this roundup throughout the show, so make sure to keep checking back!
title: Summer Game Fest 2025: Everything Announced

author: Eric Song
description: The best value in VR gaming is now even less expensive.
title: Save 10% Off the Meta Quest 3S VR Headset for Father's Day, Includes Batman: Arkham VR

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Dads aren't actually that hard to shop for.
title: The Best Father's Day Gift Ideas for Every Type of Dad

author: Tom Marks
description: This interactive brochure is a muddled collection of quaint tech demos and boring factoids.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour Review

author: Eric Song
description: Dad would surely appreciate this gift.
title: The Apple AirPods Pro and AirPods 4 Drop to the Lowest Prices of the Year for Father's Day

author: Dan Stapleton
title: Hogwarts Legacy Nintendo Switch 2 Review Update

author: Eric Song
description: The RTX 5070 GPU is perfect for up to 1440p gaming.
title: The PNY GeForce RTX 5070 Graphics Card Is in Stock at Best Buy for $549.99 (Launch Price With No Markup)

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Predator: Killer of Killers turns out to be more than just a simple anthology movie. Let's break down how the animated movie sets up future sequels like Predator: Badlands and Prey 2.
title: Predator: Killer of Killers Ending Explained - Does It Set Up Prey 2?

author: Robert Anderson
description: As of June 6, these are the biggest price climbers and crashers for the week for Magic: The Gathering, finally including a big drop in price for Universes Beyond: Final Fantasy in the last days before release.
title: The Biggest Magic: The Gathering Crashers and Climbers This Week - June 6

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Star Wars legend Mark Hamill had a wardrobe malfunction at the 2025 BAFTAs this year, if you can believe it — and the actor recently revealed that none other than fellow legend Demi Moore gave him a thumbs up from the audience as the incident occurred.
title: Star Wars Legend Mark Hamill Reveals Demi Moore Gave Him a Supportive Thumbs Up When His Pants Fell Down at the BAFTAs

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: After 10 years, Phineas & Ferb has returned with most of the original voice cast. Here's how to watch the new season.
title: Phineas & Ferb Returns for Season 5, First 10 Episodes Now Streaming on Disney+

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Star Wars: Starfighter cast is beginning to take shape, with Mia Goth reportedly set to join Ryan Gosling in the upcoming sci-fi film.
title: Star Wars: Starfighter Casts Mia Goth as Villain Opposite Ryan Gosling

author: Danielle Abraham
description: Save big on power banks, travel adapters, headsets, gaming laptops, and more ahead of Father's day. Plus, all the best Switch 2 accessories on sale right now
title: Today's Best Deals: Score Discounts on Travel Essentials, Gaming Gear, Father's Day Gifts & More

author: Tom Phillips
description: Legendary actor Denzel Washington will indeed star in Marvel's upcoming Black Panther 3, director Ryan Coogler has confirmed.
title: Denzel Washington Set to Star in Black Panther 3, Director Ryan Coogler Confirms

author: Vikki Blake
description: Our most recent sighting of Silent Hill f came during Sony's State of Play June 2025 showcase, and with it came our first look at Hinako in action. Literally.
title: Silent Hill f Combat Has 'A Heavier Focus on Melee' and Is 'More Action-Oriented' Than Silent Hill 2 Remake's, Producer Says

author: George Nash
title: Win LEGO Mario Kart & Bowser Sets by Sharing A Selfie using GameChat on Your Nintendo Switch 2!

author: Vikki Blake
description: If what looks like a leaked trailer is anything to go by, Lies of P's upcoming DLC, Overture, could shadow-drop very soon.
title: Lies of P: Overture Trailer Leaks Online, Teases Imminent Shadow-Drop

author: Jordan Sirani
description: Our up-to-date streaming guide on how to watch all of the John Wick movies online.
title: Where to Stream Every John Wick Movie Online in 2025

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Squid Game creator Hwang Dong-hyuk has been through a lot to bring audiences one of the best dystopian television dramas ever — and that includes losing teeth. Yep, you read that right. Hwang recently revealed that he has lost even more of his pearly whites since making Season 3.
title: Squid Game Creator Loses 2 More Teeth to Stress Making Season 3

author: Vikki Blake
description: Dune: Awakening was down for a couple of hours earlier today as Funcom applied a hotfix to help improve server stability and address a number of issues that have popped up since the game went live for "head start" players yesterday, June 5.
title: Dune: Awakening Addresses Server Stability With First 'Head Start' Patch

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: T-Pain is making his grand debut in Fortnite today, June 6, and IGN can exclusively reveal the first look at his in-game character and details on his custom world that is "redefining Zone Wars gameplay" and giving players the ability to shrink down and battle across T-Pain's gaming setup, use food-powered abilities, and more.
title: T-Pain Is Getting His Own Fortnite Character and a Custom World That Is 'Redefining Zone Wars Gameplay'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Voice actor Samantha Kelly discovered her 18-year tenure as Super Mario characters Princess Peach and Toad was over on the day that Mario Kart World was released — without her in it.
title: Princess Peach and Toad's Veteran Voice Actor Says Nintendo Told Her She'd Been Replaced on Switch 2 Launch Day As Mario Kart World Released Without Her in It

author: Ben Williams
description: Upgrade your Nintendo Switch 2 set-up with these great third-party accessories now on sale at Amazon UK, including cases, screen protectors, chargers, and more.
title: Nintendo Switch 2: Top Third-Party Accessories Just Got Heavy Discounts at Amazon in the UK

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: While The Wheel of Time seems dead after Amazon canceled the show following the conclusion of Season 3 on Prime Video, its showrunner has pointed to The Expanse in expressing hope it could one day be saved.
title: The Wheel of Time Showrunner Insists Canceled Amazon Prime Video Show Was Watched by 'Huge Numbers of People,’ Points to The Expanse in Expressing Hope It Will Be Saved

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Blue Scuti: Tetris Crasher – the first documentary film from Legendary’s Unscripted division – tells the story of Willis Gibson, aka Blue Scuti, who, on December 21, 2023, was the first person in history to beat Tetris, a feat long thought impossible. And he did it at just age 13.
title: Blue Scuti: Tetris Crasher Exclusive Trailer Debut

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: From the World of John Wick: Ballerina is getting two exclusive 4K steelbooks from Amazon and Walmart that are now available to preorder.
title: Ballerina Is Getting Two Exclusive 4K Steelbooks That Are Now Up for Preorder

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Tom Cruise performed so many burning parachute jumps while filming Mission: Impossible — The Final Reckoning that he's won a Guiness World Record.
title: Tom Cruise Did So Many Burning Parachute Jumps Filming Mission: Impossible — The Final Reckoning That He Won a Guinness World Record

author: Erik Adams
description: The Ritual's earnest attempt at a serious horror-drama that’s undermined by some distracting stylistic choices.
title: The Ritual Review

author: Vikki Blake
description: Did you know that a new SpongeBob SquarePants game was on the way called SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide? Beyond a very gentle tease late last year neither did we, but the unannounced game has popped up on a couple of rating boards, suggesting we'll get an official reveal soon.
title: Unannounced SpongeBob SquarePants Game Leaked by Not 1 but 2 Age Ratings

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Persona 4 Remake — one of the worst-kept secrets in video games — is reportedly set for an official reveal during Microsoft’s Xbox Games Showcase.
title: After Various Leaks and Voice Actor Comments, Persona 4 Remake Is Reportedly Set for an Official Reveal at the Xbox Games Showcase

author: Leanne Butkovic
description: These are the five best TVs to pair up with your Nintendo Switch 2 when it's docked.
title: The Best TVs for Nintendo Switch 2

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo and GameStop have addressed the Switch 2 launch day issue of consoles being sold to customers with broken screens, after staples were used to attach receipts onto the Switch 2's box.
title: As Switch 2 Customers With Damaged Consoles Are Offered Replacements, Nintendo Points to GameStop Statement That Uses 1999 Film Office Space to Joke That 'Staplers Have Been Confiscated'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Legendary director Ridley Scott has indicated he has moved on from the Alien franchise, declaring: "I think I’ve done enough."
title: Ridley Scott Says He's 'Done Enough' With the Alien Franchise: 'I Just Hope It Goes Further'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Sony's bumper State of Play June 2025 showcase is now PlayStation's most-viewed State of Play ever.
title: Summer 2025 State of Play Breaks Viewing Record for Sony

author: Tom Phillips
description: 24 hours into Switch 2's life, it's time to look at what's selling best on the new console's eShop — and get a sense of just how popular those $10 Zelda upgrades have been.
title: Nintendo Switch 2's Best-Selling eShop Launch Games Revealed — and Those $10 Zelda: Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom Upgrades Are Right Up There

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Elden Ring Nightreign developer FromSoftware has concluded a fresh round of server maintenance designed to improve matchmaking.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Developer FromSoftware Concludes Server Maintenance Designed to Improve Matchmaking

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo's official GameCube controller for Switch 2 includes gyro controls, fans have now discovered — a feature that Nintendo itself largely kept quiet about before launch.
title: Surprise! GameCube Controller for Nintendo Switch 2 Has Gyro Controls, and Fans Are Having Fun Working Out What It's Compatible With

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Dakota Johnson has discussed the disastrous Madame Web, issuing strong words that get at its troubled development.
title: Dakota Johnson Insists Madame Web Disaster 'Wasn’t My Fault,' Points to Decisions 'Made by People Who Don't Have a Creative Bone in Their Body'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Dune: Awakening isn't even properly out yet, but it has already set a concurrent player record on Steam of almost 100,000 players.
title: Dune: Awakening Hit Nearly 100,000 Concurrent Players on Steam — and It's Not Even Properly Out Yet

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo Switch 2 supports your smartphone as a camera, fans have discovered — and you just need two cheap cables to get up and running.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Supports Your Phone As a Camera, With Just Two Cables

author: Robert Anderson
description: From consoles, to games and accessories, here's everything Switch 2 that's now available to buy.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Consoles Are Back In Stock and Available to Buy Today at Target

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: With the release of Predator: Killer of Killers, the animated film from Prey and Predator: Badlands director Dan Trachtenberg, Michael Biehn has joined an exclusive Hollywood club.
title: With the Release of Predator: Killer of Killers, Michael Biehn Joins Perhaps the Most Exclusive Hollywood Club Ever — and Forces Film Buffs the World Over to Update Their Trivia

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Cyberpunk 2077 was thought done and dusted, and with good reason — CD Projekt had said it was itself! But alas, just when you thought the developer was out, it pulled itself back in, and now fans are set to get a surprise last (for real this time) patch for the game.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Is Getting Another Surprise Final Patch: 'We Have Been Cooking for You in Secret…'

author: Tristan Ogilvie
title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Review Update

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Black Myth: Wukong, the action RPG inspired by the classical Chinese novel Journey to the West, will finally make its way to Xbox Series X/S on August 20, 2025, exactly one year after it was released on PS5 and PC.
title: Black Myth: Wukong Finally Makes Its Way to Xbox Series X/S on August 20

author: Erik Adams
description: Director Dan Trachtenberg takes advantage of animated format to show just how cool a Predator fighting Vikings or ninja can be.
title: Predator: Killer of Killers Review

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Disney has revealed that Disneyland's Coco attraction will be located in areas that are "predominantly backstage today" near Disney California Adventure's Paradise Gardens Park and Pixar Pier and that the new Avatar land will take over a "portion" of the current Hollywood Backlot area. And yes, that means Monsters, Inc. Mike & Sulley to the Rescue! will close for good in early 2026 to make way for the Avatar destination.
title: Coco Attraction and Avatar Land Get Locations at Disneyland, Monsters, Inc. Mike & Sulley to the Rescue! Gets a Closing Window

author: Eric Song
description: Pick up one of the most powerful gaming laptops on the market for well under $3K.
title: Grab the HP Omen Max 16 RTX 5090 Gaming Laptop for an Incredible Price (Update: Another Big Price Drop)

author: Eric Song
description: Save up to 25% off most of Sonos' soundbars and speakers.
title: The Sonos Father's Day Sale Is Live and the Arc Ultra Soundbar Is on Sale for the First Time Ever

author: Adam Mathew
description: The multi-function stalk solution to ensure you keep on truckin' in premium style and input elegance.
title: AU Deals: Why This Moza Multi-Function Peripheral is Worth Stalking for Deeper Immersion, Best Prices, and More!

author: Michael Cripe
description: Gearbox Software is giving away Borderlands 2 for free on Steam, but some fans are warning others to stay away from the series due to a recent controversy surrounding its terms of service.
title: Borderlands 2 Goes Free to Keep on Steam, Where Recent EULA Changes Have Sparked a 'Mostly Negative' User Review Rating Across the Entire Franchise
